org.apache.nemo.common.ir.vertex.transform

Interface Transform<I,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - input type.
    O - output type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDoFnTransform, AggregateMetricTransform, CollectTransform, CombineFnFinalTransform, CombineFnPartialTransform, CreateViewTransform, DoFnTransform, EmptyComponents.EmptyTransform, FlatMapTransform, FlattenTransform, GroupByKeyAndWindowDoFnTransform, GroupByKeyTransform, GroupByKeyTransform, HDFSTextFileTransform, LocalTextFileTransform, MapToPairTransform, MapTransform, MetricCollectTransform, NoWatermarkEmitTransform, ReduceByKeyTransform, ReduceTransform, RelayTransform, WindowFnTransform

    public interface Transform<I,O>
extends Serializable
    Interface for specifying 'What' to do with data. It is to be implemented in the compiler frontend, possibly for every operator in a dataflow language. 'How' and 'When' to do with its input/output data are up to the runtime.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Transform.Context
      Context of the transform.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        void prepare(Transform.Context context,
             OutputCollector<O> outputCollector)
        Prepare the transform.
        Parameters:
        context - of the transform.
        outputCollector - that collects outputs.

      • onData

        void onData(I element)
        On data received.
        Parameters:
        element - data received.

      • onWatermark

        void onWatermark(Watermark watermark)
        On watermark received. This method should be called for the minimum watermark among input streams (input watermark). Transform may emit collected data after receiving watermarks.
        Parameters:
        watermark - watermark

      • close

        void close()
        Close the transform.
